{{cpp/title|showpos|noshowpos}}
{{cpp/io/manip/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|ios}}
{{dcl|num=1|
std::ios_base&amp; showpos( std::ios_base&amp; str );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|
std::ios_base&amp; noshowpos( std::ios_base&amp; str );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Enables or disables the display of the plus sign {{c|'+'}} in non-negative integer output. Has no effect on input.

@1@ Enables the {{tt|showpos}} flag in the stream {{c|str}} as if by calling {{c|str.setf(std::ios_base::showpos)}}.

@2@ Disables the {{tt|showpos}} flag in the stream {{c|str}} as if by calling {{c|str.unsetf(std::ios_base::showpos)}}.

This is an I/O manipulator, it may be called with an expression such as {{c|out &lt;&lt; std::showpos}} for any {{tt|out}} of type {{lc|std::basic_ostream}} or with an expression such as {{c|in &gt;&gt; std::showpos}} for any {{tt|in}} of type {{lc|std::basic_istream}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|str|reference to I/O stream}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|str}} (reference to the stream after manipulation).

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main()
{
    std::cout
        &lt;&lt; "showpos: " &lt;&lt; std::showpos &lt;&lt; 42 &lt;&lt; ' ' &lt;&lt; 3.14 &lt;&lt; ' ' &lt;&lt; 0 &lt;&lt; '\n'
        &lt;&lt; "noshowpos: " &lt;&lt; std::noshowpos &lt;&lt; 42 &lt;&lt; ' ' &lt;&lt; 3.14 &lt;&lt; ' ' &lt;&lt; 0 &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
showpos: +42 +3.14 +0
noshowpos: 42 3.14 0
}}
